ing.item: (Large) pineapple chunks in own juice; drain and save juice
(Large) chunky friut; drain and save juice

directions.step:
Measure pineapple juice and chunky fruit juice to equal 1 1/2 cup and add to pudding mix. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until thick. Cool slightly. Pour over fruit and refrigerate. This can be made a day ahead; bananas will not turn black.
